short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert Slack web app to PWA

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transforms your Slack web app into a seamless Progressive Web App (PWA). With just a click, you can install Slack as a PWA, giving you faster load times, smoother transitions, and offline access to your recent messages.

If you also don't like to use electron based applications then can install this plugin. this will utilize your chrome browser to run Slack. 

NOTE: All the image assets, names are belong to Slack Technologies. we just provide a way to install web app.

github: gxanshu/slack-pwa
